title: The Hidden Parchment
description: It is a Fantasy adventure set in two time frames. It is the story of how Birgit de Merlinus, a pawn of the Olde Gods/Goddesses, becomes aware she is 'The Seeker;, and has been allocated a Quest to pursue. Try as she may, she is unable to extricate herself from the task is forced to accept it after her High Priestess informs her that she has been selected and groomed for the task that began in another time frame when she was known as Princess Brighid, named after The Goddess, daughter of the King Peradur of Dragonia.
author: Carole Weave-Lane
